question: Is it permissible to play counter-strike?
answer:
QUESTION

Is counter-strike 1.6 haram or halal? I play online, this is a famous game. I always play with a character that has a mask on his face so we can’t see the face but other players play with characters who don’t have a mask on the face and we can clearly see the face of the character. Is this shirk? Because characters are made by graphic designer. Is it a “kabira gunah” or “saghira gunah” to play this game? Please guide.

ANSWER


Share:

In the Name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

As-salāmu ‘alaykum wa-rahmatullāhi wa-barakātuh.

 

It is not permissible to play the game counter-strike. It comprises of a combination of impermissible elements including the following;

1.      Pictures of animate objects

2.      Music

3.      Time which is wasted

 
And Allah Ta’āla Knows Best
